meanings.definition: Express regret for something that one has done wrong.
meanings.sent1: I apologize for breaking the vase.
meanings.sent2: She always apologizes when she makes a mistake.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the plant, so it had to apologize to the flower.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds seemed to apologize for the rain that followed.
meanings.sent5: His sincere apology made her forgive him instantly.

meanings.definition: Offer an apology or excuse for something one has done.
meanings.sent1: Please apologize to your sister for being late.
meanings.sent2: He apologized for forgetting her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The dog had to apologize to the cat for eating its food.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun seemed to apologize for leaving the sky so soon.
meanings.sent5: She quickly apologized for the misunderstanding to avoid any conflict.
